channel.title: HLTV.org - The home of competitive Counter-Strike
channel.description: HLTV.org is the leading csgo site in the world, featuring news, demos, pictures, statistics, on-site coverage and much much more!

image.title: HLTV.org - The home of competitive Counter-Strike

item.title: Virtue unveil quartet to finalise roster
item.description: Virtue Gaming have formally completed their new CS:GO squad with the addition of four players.

item.title: TACO: "[After the Major] we were rebuilding the team"
item.description: SK's Epitacio "TACO" de Melo shared details on the team's status, their Inferno and the loss to mousesports.

item.title: StarSeries round five matchups drawn
item.description: The matchups of the Swiss stage's last round, which will determine the last three teams in the playoffs, have been drawn live on stream at the end of day four in Kiev.

item.title: SK and Astralis through to quarter-finals
item.description: In the last set of matches of round four, Astralis eased past Heroic 2-0 (Overpass 16-11, Nuke 16-4) and SK beat Natus Vincere 2-0 (Cobblestone 16-12, Inferno 16-7) to earn their spots in the playoffs.

item.title: ISSAA: "I had challenges in front of me and I faced every one of them"
item.description: We managed to grab a hold of Issa "ISSAA" Murad after HellRaisers eliminated Gambit from StarSeries i-League Season 4, securing a 2-1 victory.

item.title: Intel Challenge Katowice 2018: Everything you need to know
item.description: Eight of the world's best female CS:GO teams will be playing in Katowice for a $50,000 prize pool.

item.title: ESL Pro League Season 7 Finals expanded to 16 teams
item.description: ESL has announced that the seventh edition of the Pro League will culminate with a 16-team offline event.

item.title: Liquid to playoffs over mousesports; HellRaisers eliminate Gambit
item.description: Liquid have booked their spot in the StarSeries i-League Season 4 playoffs after beating mousesports 2-1, while HellRaisers have eliminated Gambit from the event, also on three maps.

item.title: Wind and Rain sign Stifmeister
item.description: Wind and Rain have announced that they have acquired the services of the team known as Stifmeister.
